rukus.text: Falamma Qađa Musa Al-'Ajala Wa Sara Bi'ahlihi 'Anasa Min Janibi At-Turi Naraan Qala Li'hlihi Amkuthu 'Inni 'Anastu Naraan La`alli 'Atikum Minha Bikhabarin 'Aw Jadhwatin Mina An-Nari La`allakum Tastaluna
Falamma 'Ataha Nudi Min Shati'i Al-Wadi Al-'Aymani Fi Al-Buq`ati Al-Mubarakati Mina Ash-Shajarati 'An Ya Musa 'Inni 'Ana Allahu Rabbu Al-`Alamina
Wa 'An 'Alqi `Asaka Falamma Ra'aha Tahtazzu Ka'annaha Jannun Walla Mudbiraan Wa Lam Yu`aqqib Ya Musa 'Aqbil Wa La Takhaf 'Innaka Mina Al-'Aminina
Asluk Yadaka Fi Jaybika Takhruj Bayđa'a Min Ghayri Su'in Wa Ađmum 'Ilayka Janahaka Mina Ar-Rahbi Fadhanika Burhanani Min Rabbika 'Ila Fir`awna Wa Mala'ihi 'Innahum Kanu Qawmaan Fasiqina
Qala Rabbi 'Inni Qataltu Minhum Nafsaan Fa'akhafu 'An Yaqtuluni
Wa 'Akhi Harunu Huwa 'Afsahu Minni Lisanaan Fa'arsilhu Ma`iya Rid'aan Yusaddiquni 'Inni 'Akhafu 'An Yukadhibuni
Qala Sanashuddu `Ađudaka Bi'akhika Wa Naj`alu Lakuma Sultanaan Fala Yasiluna 'Ilaykuma Bi'ayatina 'Antuma Wa Mani Attaba`akuma Al-Ghalibuna
Falamma Ja'ahum Musa Bi'ayatina Bayyinatin Qalu Ma Hadha 'Illa Sihrun Muftaraan Wa Ma Sami`na Bihadha Fi 'Aba'ina Al-'Awwalina
Wa Qala Musa Rabbi 'A`lamu Biman Ja'a Bil-Huda Min `Indihi Wa Man Takunu Lahu `Aqibatu Ad-Dari 'Innahu La Yuflihu Az-Zalimuna

Wa Qala Fir`awnu Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Mala'u Ma `Alimtu Lakum Min 'Ilahin Ghayri Fa'awqid Li Ya Hamanu `Ala At-Tini Faj`al Li Sarhaan La`alli 'Attali`u 'Ila 'Ilahi Musa Wa 'Inni La'azunnuhu Mina Al-Kadhibina
Wa Astakbara Huwa Wa Junuduhu Fi Al-'Arđi Bighayri Al-Haqqi Wa Zannu 'Annahum 'Ilayna La Yurja`una
Fa'akhadhnahu Wa Junudahu Fanabadhnahum Fi Al-Yammi Fanzur Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Az-Zalimina
Wa Ja`alnahum 'A'immatan Yad`una 'Ila An-Nari Wa Yawma Al-Qiyamati La Yunsaruna
Wa 'Atba`nahum Fi Hadhihi Ad-Dunya La`natan Wa Yawma Al-Qiyamati Hum Mina Al-Maqbuhina
